A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Entertaining\, but more so as a stand alone film. It takes the original trilogy and nearly throws it away. It also seemed as if The Force Awakens was a waste of time. It felt like a good movie for very casual Star Wars fans or the type to enjoy anything as long as it's branded with the Star Wars label.  Once again\, it's entertaining\, but this movie isn't for those that loved the original trilogy.
